name: Brute_Defense.Regeneration
display_help: Regeneration lets you regenerate more quickly from damage and effects. Regeneration offers almost no actual damage resistance, but your Hit Point Regeneration can become so incredibly fast, that your wounds heal almost instantly. Those who possess this power set have little downtime.

powers.name: Brute_Defense.Regeneration.Fast_Healing
powers.display_help: You heal Hit Points at a faster rate than normal. This power is always on.

display_info: 25.95% resistance to regeneration rate debuff for 10.25s on self

powers.name: Brute_Defense.Regeneration.Reconstruction
powers.display_help: Through perfect control of your body, you can concentrate for a few moments and heal yourself. The effects of Reconstruction also leaves you resistant to Toxic damage for a while. Recharge: Slow

display_info: 15.00% resistance to toxic damage for 1m 0s on self

powers.name: Brute_Defense.Regeneration.Quick_Recovery
powers.display_help: You recover Endurance at a faster rate than normal. This power is always on.

powers.name: Brute_Defense.Regeneration.Dull_Pain
powers.display_help: Using ancient techniques, you can make yourself more resilient to pain. Thus, you can take more damage before being defeated. When you activate this power you will increase your maximum Hit Points for a couple of minutes. Recharge: Very Long

powers.name: Brute_Defense.Regeneration.Integration
powers.display_help: You can Integrate your mind and body, making you resistant to Knockback, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, and Immobilization effects, as well as increase your regeneration rate, for as long as you can keep this toggle power active. Integration also taunts nearby foes. Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Knockback, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize), +Regeneration, Taunt

display_info: 10000.00% resistance to knockup, knock for 2.25s on self
-10.0 knockup protection, knock protection for 2.25s on self
-10.4 hold protection, immobilize protection, stun protection, sleep protection for 2.25s on self
10000.00% resistance to knockup, knock for 2.25s on self
-10.0 knockup protection, knock protection for 2.25s on self
103.80% resistance to hold, immobilize, stun, sleep for 2.25s on self
30.00% resistance to defense debuff, to hit debuff, recharge debuff for 2.25s on self
50.00% resistance to run speed debuff, fly speed debuff, jump speed debuff, jump height debuff for 2.25s on self

powers.name: Brute_Defense.Regeneration.Resist_Disorientation
powers.display_help: You are more Resilient. This power allows you to build up a resistance to Disorientation effects. You tend not to get Disoriented, and if you do, it wears off quickly. This resistance to Disorientation gets stronger as you go up in level. Resilience also grants some resistance to all types of damage. This power is always on.

display_info: 173.00% resistance to stun for 10.25s on self
224.90% resistance to stun for 10.25s on self
9.38% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10.25s on self

powers.name: Brute_Defense.Regeneration.Instant_Healing
powers.display_help: When you activate this power, you can regenerate your health at an astounding rate. This boost to your Regeneration Rate lasts about a minute and takes a long time to recharge once used. Recharge: Extremely Long

powers.name: Brute_Defense.Regeneration.Revive
powers.display_help: Should you fall in battle, you can Revive yourself from the brink of death. You will revive with most of your Hit Points and half your Endurance and be protected from XP Debt for 90 seconds. You will also have 15 seconds of immunity to most damage. Recharge: Very Long

display_info: 1 ticks of 1124.44 heal for 0.5s on self

powers.name: Brute_Defense.Regeneration.Moment_of_Glory
powers.display_help: When you activate this power, you gain Resistance and Defense to all damage types except Psionics, recover Endurance more quickly, and are highly resistant to Knock Back, Sleep, Disorient, Immobilization, and Hold effects. Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: Self +Res(All DMG but Psionics, Knock Back, Repel, Stun, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize), +DEF(All DMG but Psionics), +Recovery

display_info: -100.0 knockup protection, knock protection, repel protection for 15s on self
1000.00% resistance to knockup, knock, repel for 15s on self
71.25% strength to smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy for 15s on self
71.25% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, toxic damage for 15s on self
-17.3 hold protection, stun protection, sleep protection for 15s on self
173.00% resistance to hold, immobilize, stun, sleep for 15s on self
